overview_of_class: This intermediate-level course aims to continue developing student' skills in Modern Standard Arabic, including their abilities to read, understand and discuss Arabic writings. Special emphasis is placed on developing reading and writing skills. Fluency building will be a focus in various stages of this class.
name: Arabic III
title: WCAS ARABIC 211-2-20 Arabic III

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This intermediate-level course aims to continue developing student' skills in Modern Standard Arabic, including their abilities to read, understand and discuss Arabic writings. Special emphasis is placed on developing reading and writing skills. Fluency building will be a focus in various stages of this class.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Class meetings will be used for presentation of grammar topics and discussion of previously assigned and new materials.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Grades will be based on class participation, individual progress in comprehending textual material and acquired degree of fluency in the language.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Al-Kitaab fii Ta'allum al-'Arabiyya with DVDs: A Textbook for Arabic, Part Two, Second Edition - Georgetown University Press - ISBN: 978-1589010963

Supplemental materials provided by the instructor

subject: ARABIC
